name: H&ST
description:
Created by Ashley Lee 2021

FPS map recreation! H&ST (pronounced "heist") recreates partial FPS maps for VALORANT (Ascent, B site and Breeze, mid),  Escape from Tarkov  (Woods, Lumber Mill), and a custom map of my own (if you can find it!). Inspired by Hide and Seek Tag, Heist steals maps from FPS games and uses their excellent design for educational purposes.

Downloads include a .exe file and the gamemaker source code. GameMaker Studio 2 is free to use, so anyone can easily take a look at the ~400 lines of code and 20+ sprites created.

FPS features: player and enemy movement, HP, enemy AI, different AI classes, FPS maps, wall collision, entrance and exit spawn points

Tutorials used:

Shaun Spalding's Complete Platformer in Gamemaker Studio 2 (27 videos): https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLPRT_JORnIupqWsjRpJZjG07N01Wsw_GJ

Gamemaker's "Your first game" (8 videos):  https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLhIbBGhnxj5IcGWhJQNF5hScmCCn4M3xg
